content.question: Describe your {{ divorceWho }}'s behaviour
content.explanation: You should include examples of your {{ divorceWho }}'s behaviour which affect you the most, and the most recent incidents.
content.overTime: You can describe how they've behaved over a period of time or use particular incidents. Try to include dates if you remember them.
content.examples: Use as many examples as you want to, as long as it's enough to satisfy the court that you can't reasonably be expected to live with them.
content.warning: Your {{ divorceWho }} will be sent a copy of your divorce application, so you may want to avoid language that will cause conflict between you.

reasonForDivorceBehaviourDetails.invalid: Provide at least 1 example of your {{ divorceWho }}'s behaviour
